Alongside releasing the new version of the engine, … [+1563 chars]

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: Assassin’s Creed tabletop RPG focuses on its science fiction elements - Polygon
articles.description: Assassin’s Creed is being turned into a D&D-like tabletop RPG. By focusing on the Animus technology, developer CMON says players will be set loose across time.
articles.content: Step into the DNA-reading Animus machine
